description: Create a project transport plan driver summary.
validation_notes: --filter entries must be in key=value format with a non-empty key; --filters must be valid JSON. Date filters (ordered_date, ordered_date_min/max, pickup_date, pickup_date_min/max) must parse as dates. driver and transport_order filters must be integers. is_managed, was_unmanaged, and has_driver_prediction_position are cast as booleans. transport_order_status must be a valid transport_order_status enum value. If --all-metrics is set, any specified metrics are ignored and the API returns all metrics.

flags.name: --all-metrics
flags.description: Include all metrics returned by the API

flags.name: --filter
flags.validation: Repeatable key=value pairs. Available filters: broker, customer, driver, is_managed, was_unmanaged, has_driver_prediction_position, ordered_date, ordered_date_min, ordered_date_max, pickup_date, pickup_date_min, pickup_date_max, project_division, project_office, project_category, transport_order_status, transport_order.

flags.name: --filters
flags.validation: JSON object of filter keys to values. Available filters: broker, customer, driver, is_managed, was_unmanaged, has_driver_prediction_position, ordered_date, ordered_date_min, ordered_date_max, pickup_date, pickup_date_min, pickup_date_max, project_division, project_office, project_category, transport_order_status, transport_order.

flags.name: --group-by
flags.description: Group by attributes (comma-separated). Defaults to driver unless set.
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of: broker, customer, driver, has_driver_prediction_position, is_managed, ordered_date, pickup_date, project_category, project_division, project_office, transport_order_status, was_unmanaged. Use empty string for a total summary.

flags.name: --metric
flags.validation: Available metrics: count, confirmation_count, confirmation_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_present_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_missing_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_not_in_candidates_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_in_candidates_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_correct_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_incorrect_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_top_2_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_top_3_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_top_5_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_top_10_pct, transport_order_count, ordered_minutes_sum, ordered_minutes_avg, ordered_miles_sum, ordered_miles_avg, routed_minutes_sum, routed_minutes_avg, routed_miles_sum, routed_miles_avg, deviated_minutes_sum, deviated_minutes_avg, deviated_miles_sum, deviated_miles_avg, routed_minutes_over_ordered_pct, routed_miles_over_ordered_pct, deviated_minutes_over_routed_pct, deviated_miles_over_routed_pct.

flags.name: --metrics
flags.validation: Comma-separated metrics. Available metrics: count, confirmation_count, confirmation_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_present_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_missing_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_not_in_candidates_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_in_candidates_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_correct_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_incorrect_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_top_2_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_top_3_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_top_5_pct, driver_assignment_prediction_top_10_pct, transport_order_count, ordered_minutes_sum, ordered_minutes_avg, ordered_miles_sum, ordered_miles_avg, routed_minutes_sum, routed_minutes_avg, routed_miles_sum, routed_miles_avg, deviated_minutes_sum, deviated_minutes_avg, deviated_miles_sum, deviated_miles_avg, routed_minutes_over_ordered_pct, routed_miles_over_ordered_pct, deviated_minutes_over_routed_pct, deviated_miles_over_routed_pct.
